name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save Instagram contents easy and quickly!

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Just right mouse click to open an Instagram image or video in a new tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Just right mouse click on the image or video and select "Open in a new tab", from there you can download the desired media (e.g. using "File > Save as..." or pressing Ctrl+S or Cmd+S for macOS users)
